amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language directing local housing authorities to delay issuing new vouchers or certificates for section 8 incremental assistance until October 1, 1996, and to slow the rate at which public housing projects are developed during fiscal year 1996.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed in the Congressional Record of July 26 as amendment No. 65, to strike provisions directing local housing authorities to delay issuing new vouchers or certificates for Section 8 incremental rental assistance until the end of FY 1996; and allows HUD to slow work on projects over the course of FY 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stokes amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 235 (Roll no. 593).
